opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Cirillo v. King, Appellant.
Argued January 22, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Bobeets and Pomeeoy, JJ.
George A. D’Angelo, with him Colbert C. McClain, and Truscott and Erisman, for appellant.
J. E. Solomon, Jr., with him William L. O’Hey, Jr., for appellee.
May 27, 1970:
